info.name: Reinterpret

info.description: Play out melds from your hand, and get creative by reinterpreting the "11" and "12" cards.

label-guide.text:
Players:		Deck:			Hand:
3p			4 suits (3-12)	13 cards
4p			5 suits (3-12)	12 cards

Valid Actions:
* Play a stronger meld (maximum 4)
* Add to current meld (maximum 4)
* Pass (hard pass)

Valid Melds:			Example:
* Singles 			3♠
* Sets				11♠, 1♥, 1♦, 1♣
* Suited Runs		12♦, 3♦, 4♦
